recipesJson.name: Portly Fungi
recipesJson.author: RdaJunkie
recipesJson.description: I have a buddy who loves fruit vapes but isn't a fan of cream or bakery flavors at all. So this is what I came up with for him. Not my personal favorite but if you dig fruit vapes then this might be for you. Enjoy ✌️️

reviews.text: Really nice fruity combo you have going on. I'm not getting alot of distinction between the flavors but it's a really good combo. Gets a little harsh after about a week so this is one I'll mix in smaller quantities but really good straight away
